title: Newly Built | luxurious | House for sale @ Nugegoda
details:
Newly Built | luxurious | House for sale @ Nugegoda

Land & Floor Area -
18.4 perches, (5000sq,ft)

Bedrooms -

5
(all A/C) / Upstair 3 & Downstair 2
wooden,tiled & Titanium flooring
with curtain / ceiling fans
All rooms having tv & telephone connections

Bathrooms -

5
Attached / Solar Hot water / Granite tops
Grohe taps / Vitra fitting
Shower cubicles (2 open to sky)

Indoor Specifications -

Entrance lobby / VIP Living / Dining with water pond & curtain
TV area open to large terrace
"kumbuk" stairway / bar area & 2 inner courtyards
Changing / Filter / Generator rooms with Laundry area

Outdoor Specifications -

Eye catching "L" shape sit-out area open to pool & garden
Separate servant facilities (room, toilet & bath)
Garden lamps

Kitchen / Pantry -

Modern eye catching pantry near to curry kitchen
Cooker/ Oven & Cooker hood / Granite top part
A modern pantry made of 100% Teak wood

Special Description -

Solar Net Metering System (8 KVA)
swimming Pool (27 x 15)
Eye catching high wooden ceiling
Generator power provisional ports have been installed
Solid wooden Interior & Exterior
Entire house made by 9 inch bricks wall
Pipe born water with over head water tank (2000 L)
Fitted ceiling fans for most of the areas
Calm & quiet highly residential area
3phase electricity / French windows / KDK celling fans
CCTV 6 camera / Door phone / Internet / Wifi

Parking -

Car porch (can park 2 vehicals)

Boundaries -

Surrounded by well built walls with remote ,wicket & service gate


Access road -

20 Feet wide road
Very closed proximity to Nugegoda city limit
Lycium school & Fingara club
Walking distance to Highlevel rd

Key places -

Bellanwila walking tracks
fingara sport club / Lycium school
Jayawaradanapura campus
Delkanda Pola

Nearest cities -

Boralesgamuwa / Maharagama / Rattanapitiya
Dehiwala / Pepiliyana / Aththidiya
Delkanda / Wijerama / Ambuldeniya
